attributes.action: To award the the village of Wootton Bassett a collective honour for their continuing shows of respect to our returning war dead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every time we see British servicemen killed in action in Afghanistan or Iraq repatriated, we see the villagers of Wootton Basset line the streets to pay their respects. Let a grateful nation honour their decency by awarding the village a collective honour.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
